title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 78.4 - Contributions by the state and liability for payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 78.4 - Contributions by the state and liability for payments

State Regulations

The State shall pay the entire premium cost of the Income

Protection Plan. The insurer shall pay the benefits under the plan and neither
the State nor the department shall be liable therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
78.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
